name: Delirious Descent
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 50.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/delirious-descent

Avoid birds and lightning while flinging clouds in order to stay in the air as long as you can. Help our little robot head friend keep all of his balloons and arrive slowly at his destination. It's ok.


Controls:
  • A and D to move left and right.
  • S to move quickly downward
  • Q and E to boost left and right, boosting consumes fuel
  • Click and drag with the mouse to fling clouds
    • Use clouds to stop birds or boost yourself upward a bit
    • Gold clouds replenish fuel

Source: https://gitlab.com/Cronno/ld50
